name: Chocodive
description:
Hello !

Here is the very first Chocolat-Endive production :)

It's a platformer prototype that we've made to test our skills, and to give it a try at Superpowers-html5.

The game is composed of one level.

As far as the code is concerned, it re-uses a lot of the available code in the Superpowers demo projects, especially the collision demo and the pac-man-like example.

All assets are home-made, except from the Superpowers logo and the font on the splash screen (Latin Modern Roman Caps regular/oblique).

The project (except the font and the Superpowers logo) is published under the following licence : https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode

The project source can be downloaded above (chocodive_project_source link) and added as a Superpowers project folder.
